name: Pick-a-Pet
description:
Do you love puzzles and animals? Would you be able to complete each level?

Pick a pet is a cute puzzle game where we should gather the pets of the same color in the same container

Play with them, feed them and have fun!

🎮 Features 🎮

🐱 There are 15 skins, let's see how luck you are and get them all from our gashapon machine .

🎨 9 Colorful themes, stars, hearts, rainbow, arcade and others!!!

🧩 Test your habilities and solve as many levels as you can

Pick a pet is a game for everyone, people who live pets and those who enjoy a relaxing experience. So don't miss your chance and download Pick a Pet!

If you find any issue you can report it in the comments section.

This game contains ads
